name: Color Bomb-Don't Touch This
description:
The game play is very easy but it can get you really really frustrated! There are beautiful colored balls coming down the screen and you need to pop these spheres, and release their beautiful neon fireworks, The trick is to avoid the forbidden color that will be shown on the banner on the top of the screen. The color on the banner keeps changing randomly every few second so you need to keep close attention not to touch that color !
This game needs a great deal of eye-hand coordination in able to score high. challenge your friends see how high can you score before you touch the
‘You Can’t Touch This” color !
